fc54e0ace1b2fce78174740277de6bdc.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves FROM eleve;

0650a72f585e49346cc420beacc14181.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS nombre_eleves FROM eleve;

3073eb88aae6ba77dbb1ea2621b558ee.sql_template:
SELECT 
    l.IDLOCALITE AS id,
    l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr,
    i.AnneeScolaire AS AnneeScolaire
FROM 
    personne p
JOIN 
    localite l ON p.Localite = l.IDLOCALITE
JOIN 
    inscriptioneleve i ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE 
    i.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '1')
    AND i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY 
    l.IDLOCALITE, l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR, i.AnneeScolaire

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    NULL AS id,
    'Pas de localite' AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr,
    i.AnneeScolaire AS AnneeScolaire
FROM 
    inscriptioneleve i
JOIN 
    personne p ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE 
    i.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '1')
    AND p.Localite IS NULL
GROUP BY 
    i.AnneeScolaire

ORDER BY 
    Nbr DESC;

3794002b375328092e6d83438b6c4a6f.sql_template:
SELECT p.NomFr, p.PrenomFr, e.id AS id_eleve, i.AnneeScolaire, i.Classe
FROM personne p
JOIN eleve e ON p.id = e.IdPersonne
JOIN inscriptioneleve i ON e.id = i.Eleve
WHERE p.NomFr = 'SASSI' AND p.PrenomFr = 'Zeineb';

2c9eba4bcdac40ffdcec5d2b87f0b99f.sql_template:
SELECT 
    n.NOMNIVFR AS Niveau,
    COALESCE(i.TypeInscri, 'Inconnu') AS TypeInscription,
    COUNT(*) AS NombreEleves
FROM inscriptioneleve i
JOIN classe c ON i.Classe = c.id
JOIN niveau n ON c.IDNIV = n.id
WHERE i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY n.NOMNIVFR, i.TypeInscri
ORDER BY n.NOMNIVFR, i.TypeInscri;

4c60dc9bcebbb52f43bce9242c2d6a2a.sql_template:
SELECT 
    n.NOMNIVFR AS Niveau,
    COUNT(*) AS NombreEleves
FROM inscriptioneleve i
JOIN classe c ON i.Classe = c.id
JOIN niveau n ON c.IDNIV = n.id
WHERE i.annuler = 0
GROUP BY n.NOMNIVFR
ORDER BY n.NOMNIVFR;

01f571b461ce2771080f42cc867c0b78.question_template: Nombre des élèves par délégation pie chart
01f571b461ce2771080f42cc867c0b78.sql_template:
SELECT
    l.IDLOCALITE AS id,
    l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr
FROM
    personne p
JOIN
    localite l ON p.Localite = l.IDLOCALITE
JOIN
    inscriptioneleve i ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE
    i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY
    l.IDLOCALITE, l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR

UNION ALL

SELECT
    NULL AS id,
    'Pas de localite' AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr
FROM
    inscriptioneleve i
JOIN
    personne p ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE
    p.Localite IS NULL
    AND i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY
    i.AnneeScolaire

ORDER BY
    Nbr DESC;

eb4a9f975efd8a669b7ebad09ae05b64.question_template: Nombre des élèves par délégation sous forme de courbe
eb4a9f975efd8a669b7ebad09ae05b64.sql_template:
SELECT
    l.IDLOCALITE AS id,
    l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr,
    i.AnneeScolaire AS AnneeScolaire
FROM
    personne p
JOIN
    localite l ON p.Localite = l.IDLOCALITE
JOIN
    inscriptioneleve i ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE
    i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY
    l.IDLOCALITE, l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR, i.AnneeScolaire

UNION ALL

SELECT
    NULL AS id,
    'Pas de localite' AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr,
    i.AnneeScolaire AS AnneeScolaire
FROM
    inscriptioneleve i
JOIN
    personne p ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE
    p.Localite IS NULL
    AND i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY
    i.AnneeScolaire

ORDER BY
    Nbr DESC;

3875e663947a329d0f8e511d5609f587.question_template: Nombre des élèves par délégation sous forme de pie chart
3875e663947a329d0f8e511d5609f587.sql_template:
SELECT
    l.IDLOCALITE AS id,
    l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr
FROM
    personne p
JOIN
    localite l ON p.Localite = l.IDLOCALITE
JOIN
    inscriptioneleve i ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE
    i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY
    l.IDLOCALITE, l.LIBELLELOCALITEFR

UNION ALL

SELECT
    NULL AS id,
    'Pas de localite' AS Localite,
    COUNT(*) AS Nbr
FROM
    inscriptioneleve i
JOIN
    personne p ON i.Personne = p.id
WHERE
    p.Localite IS NULL
    AND i.Annuler = 0
GROUP BY
    i.AnneeScolaire;
